about_the_game:
How long can you survive for? 

The Chronicles: Wasteland Assault, a classic survival shooter that goes back to a familiar formula of how a wave-by-wave shooter should be. Join this developing community and be a part of a growing, and expanding world that takes place in the same universe as the hit books, written by Tyee ‘Lar Oxenbury. 

Constant free updates. 

TC:WA is a free game, and is constantly being worked on with new content and features. Participate in this expanding development, leave your input, share your thoughts, and watch how this game will be tailored towards players who are just as passionate as the development team itself. 

Feel the power, slay them all. 

Every weapon has their strengths. You'll surely find one that you'll love. Upgrade your arsenal with attachments to further push the boundaries on how far you can survive for. Experiment with different perks, strengthen their effects by stacking them multiple times.

content_descriptors.notes: The Chronicles: Wasteland Assault does contain frequent violence and gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 or 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 or 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 2GB of VRAM.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: With nowhere else to run, you are forced to face off against wave after wave of an endless Screamer hoard. How long can you survive for? Strengthen you character, and bolster your armoury. Can you achieve the highest score, and trump your competitors by killing the most, and surviving the longest?
